name: Research Assistant - Web search and summarization.
description: A practical agent that searches the web and provides researched answers.

params.name: query
params.default: What are the benefits of meditation?

name: Lead Qualifier
description:
Scores and qualifies sales leads based on company information, engagement signals,
and fit criteria. Uses web search to enrich lead data and returns a structured
qualification score with reasoning. Perfect for prioritizing outreach efforts.

name: Document Q&A System - RAG with PDF documents.
description: A system for answering questions about uploaded documents.

name: Sales Email Drafter
description:
Generates personalized cold outreach emails based on prospect research.
Uses web search to find relevant talking points and crafts emails that
reference specific company news, challenges, or initiatives.

fields.name: call_to_action
fields.description: The specific CTA in the email

name: Customer Support Agent - Multi-agent support system.
description: A team of agents that handles different types of customer inquiries.

name: CRM Data Enricher
description:
Automatically enriches CRM contact records with company information,
LinkedIn insights, recent news, and technology stack details.
Perfect for keeping CRM data fresh and actionable.

name: Code Review Agent - Automated code review.
description: An agent that reviews code and provides actionable feedback.

params.name: file
params.description: Path to code file to review

name: Deal Risk Analyzer
description:
Analyzes sales deals to predict closure probability and identify risks.
Uses deal context (stage, engagement, competition) to score risk and
suggest mitigation strategies.

name: Blog Post Generator - Multi-step content workflow.
description: A workflow that generates blog posts through research, writing, and editing.

params.name: topic
params.default: The benefits of mindfulness in daily life

params.name: output
params.description: Output file for the blog post

name: Proposal Generator
description:
Generates customized sales proposals from templates and prospect data.
Researches the prospect's company to personalize value propositions
and creates executive summaries, pricing sections, and next steps.

fields.name: personalization_notes
fields.description: How this proposal was customized for the prospect

name: Data Analysis Agent - Analyze data and generate insights.
description: An agent that analyzes datasets and provides actionable insights.

params.name: question
params.default: Analyze this data and provide key insights

name: Competitor Battle Cards
description:
Generates real-time competitive intelligence battle cards by researching
competitors and creating comparison matrices, objection handlers, and
win strategies for sales teams.

output_schemas.name: ObjectionHandler
output_schemas.docstring: How to handle a specific objection.

name: Personal Knowledge Base - Agent that learns about users.
description: An agent that remembers user information and provides personalized responses.

name: Sales Call Summarizer
description:
Processes sales call transcripts to extract key information, action items,
next steps, and updates for CRM. Works with transcripts from Gong, Chorus,
or manual notes.

name: Clinical Decision Support - Medical knowledge agent.
description: A domain-specific agent for clinical information (educational only).

params.name: query
params.default: What are the first-line treatments for hypertension?

name: Territory Planner
description:
Optimizes sales territory assignments by analyzing account potential,
geographic distribution, and rep capacity to create balanced territories.

name: Commission Calculator
description:
Calculates sales commissions based on complex compensation plans including
accelerators, SPIFFs, team bonuses, and what-if scenarios.

name: Churn Predictor
description:
Analyzes customer usage patterns, support tickets, and engagement signals
to predict churn risk and recommend retention strategies.

name: Social Media Manager
description:
Creates, schedules, and analyzes social media content across platforms.
Drafts platform-specific posts, suggests optimal posting times, and tracks
engagement patterns. Uses team workflows for content creation and approval.

fields.name: content_calendar_note
fields.description: Where this fits in content calendar

fields.name: a_b_test_suggestion
fields.description: A/B test idea for this content

name: SEO Content Optimizer
description:
Analyzes and optimizes content for search engine rankings. Performs keyword
research, content scoring, and provides actionable suggestions to improve
organic visibility. Compares against top-ranking competitors.

fields.name: content_gaps
fields.description: Topics they cover that you don't

name: Ad Copy Generator
description:
Creates high-converting ad copy for multiple platforms (Google Ads, Facebook,
LinkedIn). Generates A/B test variants, respects character limits, and applies
proven copywriting frameworks (AIDA, PAS, etc.).

fields.description: Name for this variant (A, B, C, etc.)

fields.name: variants
fields.description: Ad copy variants for A/B testing

fields.name: testing_hypothesis
fields.description: What we're testing with these variants

name: Campaign Performance Analyst
description:
Analyzes marketing campaign performance across channels. Provides cross-channel
attribution insights, ROI calculations, and actionable recommendations for
budget optimization. Identifies trends and anomalies.

name: Influencer Matcher
description:
Finds and evaluates influencers for brand partnerships. Analyzes audience fit,
engagement authenticity, content alignment, and provides partnership
recommendations with estimated campaign ROI.

fields.name: alternative_strategies
fields.description: Alternative approaches if top picks unavailable

name: Brand Sentiment Monitor
description:
Monitors brand mentions and sentiment across social media and web. Detects
trends, identifies potential PR issues, and provides real-time brand health
insights. Alerts on significant sentiment shifts.

name: Content Calendar Planner
description:
Creates comprehensive content calendars with themes, topics, and scheduling
across multiple platforms. Balances content types, maintains posting frequency,
and aligns with marketing campaigns and seasonal events.

output_schemas.name: ContentPiece
output_schemas.docstring: Individual content piece in the calendar.

name: Email Subject Line Tester
description:
Generates and evaluates email subject lines for maximum open rates.
Creates A/B test variants, predicts performance, and applies proven
psychological triggers. Analyzes against email marketing best practices.

fields.name: best_for
fields.description: Best use case for this variant

fields.name: mobile_preview
fields.description: How it appears on mobile (~40 chars)

fields.name: top_pick_reasoning
fields.description: Why this is the top pick

name: Landing Page Optimizer
description:
Analyzes and optimizes landing page copy for conversions. Reviews headlines,
CTAs, value propositions, and overall messaging. Provides specific
improvement suggestions based on conversion rate optimization best practices.

fields.name: clarity_score
fields.description: How clear is the value prop

tags, relevance scores, competition levels, and suggests optimal hashtag

fields.description: Best use case for this hashtag

fields.name: best_for
fields.description: Best post type for this set

Automatically classifies, prioritizes, and routes support tickets to the
appropriate team or agent. Uses NLP to understand ticket intent, extracts
key information, and applies routing rules based on urgency and expertise.

fields.name: auto_resolution_possible

name: Knowledge Base Search

Semantic search across help documentation and knowledge base articles.

direct answers with source citations. Supports follow-up questions.

fields.description: Clear, concise answer to the question

name: Escalation Predictor
description:
Predicts which support tickets are likely to escalate based on sentiment,
history, and issue complexity. Flags high-risk tickets for proactive
intervention before customer frustration peaks.

name: CSAT Analyzer
description:
Analyzes customer satisfaction survey responses to extract themes, identify

and qualitative feedback to understand customer sentiment drivers.

name: Onboarding Checklist Tracker
description:
Guides new customers through onboarding with personalized checklists.
Tracks progress, identifies stuck points, and provides proactive
assistance to ensure successful product adoption.

name: Feature Request Aggregator
description:
Clusters and prioritizes feature requests from multiple sources. Identifies

name: SLA Monitor
description:
Tracks SLA compliance in real-time, alerts on breaches, and provides
performance analytics. Monitors response times, resolution times, and

name: Customer Health Scorer
description:
Calculates customer health scores based on usage metrics, engagement signals,
and support interactions. Identifies at-risk accounts and recommends
proactive interventions to improve retention.

name: Renewal Reminder Agent
description:
Proactively manages renewal outreach with personalized timing and messaging.
Tracks renewal pipeline, identifies upsell opportunities, and generates

name: Win/Loss Analyst
description:
Analyzes win/loss interview summaries to extract patterns, identify

Categorizes expenses from receipts, validates against policy, and flags

params.name: handbook_excerpt
params.default:
EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK 2024
    
    CHAPTER 5: TIME OFF POLICIES
    
    5.1 Paid Time Off (PTO)
    - Full-time employees receive 15 days PTO in year 1-2, 20 days in years 3-5, 25 days after 5 years
    - PTO accrues monthly (1.25-2.08 days/month)
    - Maximum carryover: 5 days to next year
    - PTO requests require 2 weeks notice for 3+ days
    
    5.2 Sick Leave
    - All employees receive 10 sick days per year
    - Sick days do not roll over
    - Mental health days are included under sick leave
    - Doctor's note required for 3+ consecutive sick days
    - No advance notice required for sick days
    
    5.3 Holidays
    - Company observes 11 paid holidays
    - Floating holiday: 1 additional day of employee's choice
    
    CHAPTER 6: REMOTE WORK
    
    6.1 Eligibility
    - All employees eligible after 90-day probation
    - Manager approval required
    - Must be available during core hours (10am-3pm local time)
    
    6.2 Equipment
    - Company provides laptop and monitor
    - $500 home office stipend (one-time)
    - $50/month internet reimbursement

name: Code Explainer
description:
Category: engineering/code

DESCRIPTION:
Explains code in plain language for learning and onboarding.

params.name: code
params.default:
async def rate_limited_fetch(urls, max_concurrent=5, delay=0.1):
    semaphore = asyncio.Semaphore(max_concurrent)
    async def fetch_one(url):
        async with semaphore:
            async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
                async with session.get(url) as response:
                    await asyncio.sleep(delay)
                    return await response.json()
    return await asyncio.gather(*[fetch_one(url) for url in urls])

name: Agent Team
description:
Category: outskill_cohort3/teams

Combine multiple specialized agents to handle complex queries.
A web search agent and finance agent work together.

params.name: query
params.default: What's the latest news about NVDA and summarize analyst recommendations?

name: Finance Agent
description:
Category: outskill_cohort3/tools

Get stock prices, analyst recommendations, and company news using YFinance.

name: HackerNews Agent
description:
Category: outskill_cohort3/custom_tools

Demonstrates creating a custom function tool that the agent can call.
Fetches and summarizes top stories from Hacker News.

name: PDF RAG Agent
description:
Category: outskill_cohort3/rag

RAG with PDF documents using LanceDB for vector storage.
Downloads a sample PDF and creates a searchable knowledge base.

params.name: pdf_url
params.description: URL of PDF to download and index

params.name: query
params.default: How do I make chicken and galangal in coconut milk soup?
params.description: Question to ask about the PDF

params.name: reload
params.description: Force reload the PDF into the knowledge base

name: Reasoning Agent
description:
Category: outskill_cohort3/reasoning

Demonstrates Agno's reasoning mode for solving complex logic puzzles.
The agent shows its step-by-step thinking process when solving problems.

name: Research Workflow
description:
Category: outskill_cohort3/workflows

Two-agent workflow: Researcher gathers information, Writer creates summary.
Demonstrates manual workflow orchestration with sequential agent calls.

params.name: topic
params.description: Topic to research and write about

name: Web Search Agent
description:
Category: outskill_cohort3/tools

Search the web using DuckDuckGo and get answers with source citations.

params.name: query
params.default: What are the latest developments in AI?
